thread.title: Cruz's brother in custody, discussed starting Nikolas fan club: prosecutors

title: Cruz's brother in custody, discussed starting Nikolas fan club: prosecutors
text:
Cruz's brother in custody, discussed starting Nikolas fan club: prosecutors 7:33pm IST - 02:06 
Prosecutors say during jailhouse visits, Zachary Cruz, the brother of suspected Parkland shooter Nikolas Cruz was heard admiring his brother's popularity and talking about starting a fan club for him. Linda So reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Prosecutors say during jailhouse visits, Zachary Cruz, the brother of suspected Parkland shooter Nikolas Cruz was heard admiring his brother's popularity and talking about starting a fan club for him.
